nodes.text: Ugbuz was the alpha-male of the Gakfedd clan in 12 ABY who wore a helmet adorned with other Gamorrean's ears and wielded an axe made of blast shielding. On Pzob, the Gamorrean was captured by the Imperial battlemoon the Eye of Palpatine. Brainwashed to become a stormtrooper squad leader, he had several encounters with Luke Skywalker. When he and his warriors were freed, they negotiated with Drost Elegin to become his personal bodyguards.
